content: a lovely **tunisian crochet** square that looks a whole lot like knit two basic stitches combine for a rhythmic and relaxing crochet experience beginner-friendly and fun to make the crochet chill square is the breath of fresh air you ve been looking for this square was designed as part of the knitter knotter tunisian blanket cal 2021 to see all details about the cal and access the free patterns visit the knitter knotter site 1 **materials** -130 yards worsted weight yarn -8mm tunisian crochet hook interchangeable or rigid hook will work -blocking mat and pins -scissors -tapestry needle **stitches & techniques** -tunisian simple stitch -tunisian knit stitch -bind off in pattern *find the free version of the crochet chill square here 2 * // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 https //knitterknotter com/ 2 http //tlycblog com/crochet-chill-square-free-pattern
